sentences.english: Under these experimental conditions, the yield of piperazine is about 85%.
sentences.chinese: 在該實驗條件下，哌嗪的收率達到85%左右。

sentences.english: Some method about synthesis of piperazine with aliphatic amine were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了由脂肪胺合成哌嗪的幾種方法。

sentences.english: Aim To study the synthesis and antidepressant activities of aryl alkanol piperazine derivatives .
sentences.chinese: 目的研究芳烷醇哌嗪類化合物的合成及抗抑鬱活性。

sentences.english: The present invention relates to piperazines of formula I.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及通式I的哌嗪類。

sentences.english: Q is a piperidine or piperazine ring that can have a bridge or a fused ring.
sentences.chinese: 爲哌啶或哌嗪環，其可具有橋基或稠合環。

sentences.english: The market prospects of piperazine is analyzed also.
sentences.chinese: 分析了哌嗪的市場前景。

sentences.english: The synthesis of piperazine and its derivatives from hydroxylamine was discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論了以羥胺爲原料環合得到哌嗪及其衍生物。

sentences.english: Conclusion Levodropropizine was an effective anti…
sentences.chinese: 結論左羥丙哌嗪爲一良好的鎮咳藥。

sentences.english: Objective To improve Piperazine condensation reaction in the preparation of Ciprofloxacin hydrochloride.
sentences.chinese: 目的改進鹽酸環丙沙星製備中的哌嗪縮合反應。

definition: cyclopentene C5H8 (ring of five carbon atoms)
